channel.title: Incorrect spell lists for Bard
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Incorrect spell lists for Bard" - I noticed some incongruencies between the Wikidot Bard Spell list and D&DBeyond's pages

item.title: Re: Incorrect spell lists for Bard
item.content:encoded:
Hi bsea219,

The following spells are listed as Bard spells (on this website) due to them being a part of the expanded spell list from the optional 'Additional Bard Spells' feature provided in Tasha's:

  • Color Spray
  • Command
  • Aid
  • Enlarge/Reduce
  • Mirror Image
  • Intellect Fortress
  • Mass Healing Word
  • Slow
  • Phantasmal Killer
  • Rary’s Telepathic Bond (Ritual)
  • Heroes’ Feast
  • Dream of the Blue Veil
  • Prismatic Spray
  • Antipathy/Sympathy
  • Prismatic Wall

Currently, there's yet to be a distinction implemented to mark these particular spells (as well as the optional additional spells on other casters) as part of the optional 'Additional spells' feature(s).

Hope this clears up any confusion!

item.title: Incorrect spell lists for Bard
item.content:encoded: Two spells that I've noticed so far (Color Spray, Mirror Image) are listed as bard spells on this website, but are not considered bard spells on D&D Beyond. I don't know if D&D Beyond is missing information, if the spells have been updated recently, or if the information on the Wikidot is incorrect, but I figured I'd point it out just in case!!!
